# generated by cmake-generator
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.3)

add_library(guise-client STATIC 
  client.c
  debug.c
  incoming.c
  outgoing.c
  outgoing_api.c)


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR})
include(Tornado)
set_tornado(guise-client)

target_include_directories(guise-client PUBLIC ../include)

target_link_libraries(guise-client 
  PUBLIC guise-serialize
  PUBLIC datagram-transport
  PUBLIC flood
  PUBLIC monotonic-time
  PUBLIC imprint
  PUBLIC secure-random)
